PageTitle: peer local-graceful-restart timer restart (BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view) (IPv6)
FuncDef:
The peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command sets the maximum duration for a device to wait for the BGP peer relationship with a specified peer to be reestablished. After this command is run, the device will not advertise the maximum duration to the specified peer.
The undo peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command deletes the configured duration. The peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command sets the maximum duration for a device to wait for the BGP peer relationship with a specified peer to be reestablished. After this command is run, the device will not advertise the maximum duration to the specified peer. The undo peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command deletes the configured duration. By default, a device waits for the peer relationship with a peer to be reestablished for a maximum of 150 seconds. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view,BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv6 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The format is X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the maximum time for the local end to wait for GR recovery of the peer.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 3600, in seconds.
